Name: Dama Blanca
Ingredients: 15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: This tequila (in place of gin) based riff on a White Lady is basically a straight-up Margarita made with lemon rather than lime, softened and smoothed by egg white. This is a delightful drink. Go easy spraying the zest, as this can overly dominate the drink. It also works best with light agave syrup, as the darker versions affect its virgin-like hue and can add unwanted caramel notes.
History: Created in February 2017 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Dama Blanca contains 190 calories
